zalanceapi.name: Zalance API
zalanceapi.description: The Zalance API for retrieving products, making purchases, and handling payments.

project-id.name: Project Id
project-id.desc: The Id of your project Zalance.

livemode.name: Live Mode
livemode.desc: Check this mode when you're ready to launch your app. Card networks or payment providers process payments. Othewise, run in test mode to test your app.

on-prices-received.description: Callback triggered when get prices has completed.

on-buy-click.description: Triggered when the button is clicked.

on-checkout-start.description: Callback triggered when the checkout session has begun and the payment iframe is showing.

on-checkout-finish.description: Callback triggered when a checkout session has completed.

on-error.description: Callback triggered when an error occurs.

set-account-id.display-text: Set the player's account Id to [i]{0}[/i]

get-prices.description: Retrieves items from the public catalog. Up to 50 items can be returned at once. GetItems does not work off a cache of the Catalog and should be used when trying to get recent item updates. However, please note that item references data is cached and may take a few moments for changes to propagate.

count.name: Count
count.desc: Number of items to retrieve. This value is optional. Maximum page size is 50. Default value is 20.

page.name: Page
page.desc: The current page to retrieve. This value is optional. Default value is 1.

start-checkout.display-text: Start a checkout session with a price Id: {0}, quantity: {1}, and automatic tax collection: {2}.
start-checkout.description: Begin the checkout session to purchase products. This will spawn a payment window so the customer can complete the transaction in a secured environment.

quantity.name: Quantity
quantity.desc: The quantity of the item to purchase.

automatic-tax.name: Automatic Tax
automatic-tax.desc: Collects tax automatically if set using the business address and tax registrations required to perform the tax calculation associated with the account.

start-checkout-cart.display-text: Start a checkout session with a list of line-items: {0} and automatic tax collection: {1}
start-checkout-cart.description: Begin the checkout session to purchase products. This will spawn a payment window so the customer can complete the transaction in a secured environment.

line-items.name: Line Items
line-items.desc: A JSON array of price Ids and quantities to be purchased. Ex: [{"price_id": "PRICE_1234", "quantity": 2}]

automatic-tax.name: Automatic Tax
automatic-tax.desc: Collects tax automatically if set using the business address and tax registrations required to perform the tax calculation associated with the account.

get-account-id.description: Get the Zalance user's account Id.

get-last-prices.description: Get the JSON array of last fetched prices.

get-next-price-page.description: Get the next page number of prices to fetch.

get-current-price-page.description: Get the current page number of prices.

get-last-error.description: Get the most recent error message.
